caption: This photograph depicts a polluted landscape, primarily featuring a large pile of garbage and debris near a body of water. In the foreground, there is a prominent sign stating "NO DUMPING," mounted on a wooden post. Despite the warning, the area around the sign is cluttered with various cast-offs, including broken furniture, discarded building materials, and miscellaneous waste. The background offers a view of a calm river or lake, with a clear sky above and some foliage to the sides. The contrast between the serene natural background and the chaotic, dirty foreground underscores a neglect of environmental care.
title: Shore of middle branch of Baltimore Harbor at Port Covington
